name: Anby
agent_background:
Anby, the original member of Gentle House.
According to the New Eridu resident records, her identity as "Anby Demara" only exists after joining Gentle House, the name obviously being taken from Nicole. Before registering as an employee of Gentle House, all data relating to Anby is suspiciously blank.
Despite her extreme lack of common sense, Anby is well-versed in matters related to combat and is among the strongest combatants of the Cunning Hares.

Anby's greatest interest is movies, of which she likes an extensive range of genres. Due to an excessive obsession, she tends to take the stories in movies as reality.
Contrary to her seemingly emotionless appearance, Anby is easily moved by movie storylines.
Her favorite food is hamburgers because "they contain protein, carbs, and greens, taste good, and are even affordable â€” there's nothing else besides hamburgers.

basic_attack.name: Turbo Volt
basic_attack.description: Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

basic_attack.name: Thunderbolt
basic_attack.description:
After unleashing the 3rd hit of the Basic Attack, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press Basic Attack to activate:
Unleashes a downward strike that deals Electric DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

dodge.name: Slide
dodge.description:
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Taser Blast
dash_attack.description: Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Thunderclap
dodge_counter.description:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Thunderfall
quick_assist.description:
Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Flash
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Lightning Whirl
assist_follow_up.description:
Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Fork Lightning
special_attack.description:
Unleashes an upward slash that deals Electric DMG.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd-hit of the Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Lightning Bolt
ex_special_attack.description:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals Electric DMG.
This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd-hit of her Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Electro Engine
chain_attack.description:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Overdrive Engine
ultimate.description:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several falling attacks, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Fluctuating Voltage
core_passive.description: Launch a Basic Attack: Thunderbolt, Special Attack, or EX Special Attack after the 3rd-hit of Anby's Basic Attack for an extra 64% Daze.

additional_ability.name: Parallel Connection
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's Dodge Counter hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Rapid Charge Mode
mindscape_cinema.description: When the 4th-hit of Anby's Basic Attack hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Precision Discharge
mindscape_cinema.description: When Basic Attack: Thunderbolt hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's EX Special Attack hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Well-Desciplined
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Conducting Charge
mindscape_cinema.description: When Anby launches a Chain Attack or uses her Ultimate, off-field Electric characters recover 3 Energy. For every 12% of Anby's Energy Generation Rate, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6 additional Energy.

mindscape_cinema.name: Street Experience
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Charging Field
mindscape_cinema.description: When Anby uses her EX Special Attack, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her Basic Attack or Dash Attack, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
